reindex.title: Build search index
reindex.msg1: Select your preferred method for updating the search index. You have two options:
reindex.msg2: Build: Updates the index by adding all data without starting over
reindex.msg3: Delete and Build: Removes the current search index and creates a new one from the beginning. Note: Search results will be unavailable until the rebuild is complete

index.index-old: This index is outdated as it was built <span am-time-ago='indexDate'>

permissions.search:index:rebuild: Enables clearing and rebuilding the search index
permissions.search:index:access: Enables access to the search index menu

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.Enable.title: Regular indexing jobs
VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.Enable.description: Enable or disable regular search index builders

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.CronEx.title: Indexing job cron expression
VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.CronEx.description: For X minutes, use '0/x * * * *'. For X hours, use '0 */x * * *'. You can also set X minutes as '15 */x * * *', and X days as '0 0 */x * *'.

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexPartitionSize.title: Maximum number of items per indexing partition
VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexPartitionSize.description: Enter the maximum number of items to include in each indexing partition. Providing high values may lead to slower performance

VirtoCommerce.Search.PartialDocumentUpda.title: Partial document update
VirtoCommerce.Search.PartialDocumentUpda.description: Enable partial document updates if supported by a search provider
